# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(NanoC_Compiler LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(NanoC_Compiler "")
set_target_properties(NanoC_Compiler PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "NanoC_Compiler")
set_target_properties(NanoC_Compiler PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(NanoC_Compiler PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET NanoC_Compiler PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(NanoC_Compiler PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(NanoC_Compiler PRIVATE
    src/Compiler_NCASM_to_ByteCode.cpp
    src/Compiler_to_NCASM.cpp
    src/Error.cpp
    src/Lexer.cpp
    src/Parser.cpp
    src/PreProcessor.cpp
    src/VirtualMachine_NC_BYTE-CODE.cpp
    src/main.cpp
)
